verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Avia, Fanahy Masina ô !
Midina eto aminay :
Fenoy ny hasoavanao
Ny fonay noforoninao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tongava ry Mpananatra ô !
Nomen'Andriamanitray ;
Ho loharano velona
Hiboiboika ao am-po.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sokafy ny fanahinay
Hidiram-pitiavana ;
Ny tenanay malemy koa
Ampaherezonao anie.

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines:
Tahio mba hitiavanay
Ny Ray sy Jeso zanany,
Sy hitokianay Anao,
Izay Fanahy Masina.
